snippet.textDisplay: Chapter 7 was actually my favorite chapter of this game by far. The snowy landscape and the "murder" mystery that happens in it was all very very fun and pulled off expertly as was the case with the whole game to be quite frank!

snippet.textDisplay: Paper Mario... If you haven't played this game already, do. It's one of the best Nintendo RPGs of all time and is absolutely charming and a blast to play, something many other RPGs aren't.

snippet.textDisplay: wow its hard to believe another year went by so fast, i remember when you uploaded a lot of winter themed vgm's last year. something about the winter themed music kept me calm through a rough part of my life, i can honestly say your channel kept me sane and made me realize life is pretty great. but i digress, keep up the good work man and hapy holidays!

snippet.textDisplay: I just played through this game again to refresh my memories. No idea why it didn't stick with me the first time since it's an unsuprisingly awesome and charming game. Chapter 7 with the Crystal Palace and the snowy setting was probably my favorite. This theme is both mysterious and soothing. I'll be uploading a couple winter themes as I always do around the 25th.
snippet.textOriginal: I just played through this game again to refresh my memories. No idea why it didn't stick with me the first time since it's an unsuprisingly awesome and charming game. Chapter 7 with the Crystal Palace and the snowy setting was probably my favorite. This theme is both mysterious and soothing. I'll be uploading a couple winter themes as I always do around the 25th.
